name: Collecting Fruit from Garden
description: Our shop has monthly and in few cases yearly commitment with different farms. As they grow specific fruit in different seasons, we are sure to get best quality fruits from their farma and gardens.

name: Transportation to the Inventory
description: After the fruits getting collected from the gardens, they are directly transported to our warehouse thour our own transportation medium. We care about keeping the fruits totally undamaged during the transportation process.

name: Storing in Inventory
description: We have different storing facility for each type of fruit. We store them in early condition so they they can stay fresh for a long time. And we make sure to empty the inventory bero the fruits get spoiled.
